oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Ralph Emery Interviews Ray Stevens - Parts 4 and 5
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording is from Ralph Emery's (entertainer) interview of Ray Stevens (performer) for the Ralph Emery Show. Tape labeled parts 4 and 5. Recording is from October 30, 1984.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ralph Emery; Ray Stevens
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:07) Ralph Emery and Ray Stevens greet the audience and introduce "Baby's Got Her Blue Jeans on" -- (00:31) Emery inquires about Stevens' decision to record "Eric the Awful" -- (03:02) Stevens asks Emery if he ever heard his song "Janie Fricke, I'd Give You a Hickie" -- (04:55) Stevens makes a weird voice and Emery questions if he had ever been on the Glen Campbell Show -- (07:12) Emery inquires about Stevens pet peeves among other questions -- (12:00) Emery invites Stevens to perform a word association -- (12:45) Emery questions Stevens if he enjoys the new-aged recording artists while introducing Gary Morris -- (13:21) Stevens questions Emery about a biblical question, and Emery inquires about dyslexia -- (15:19) Emery and Stevens say their goodbyes, and Emery performs his commercial outros -- (16:34) Emery introduces Stevens and Stevens introduces Moe Bandy and Joe Stampley's "Boys Night Out" -- (17:11) Emery encourages Stevens to introduce Ned Nostril -- (19:28) Stevens tells a story about Ned Nostril and his legendary hunting ability; additionally, Stevens tells a joke about a hog -- (21:58) Emery invites Stevens to discuss the mistake he made on "Raindrops Keep Falling on My Head" -- (22:35) Emery questions Stevens' contribution to the movie: Cannonball Run -- (24:03) Emery invites Stevens to discuss the Statler Brothers -- (25:11) Emery asks Stevens about a possible comedic career -- (28:58) Emery praises Stevens on his career and asks about his movie career -- (31:36) Emery invites Stevens to perform "The Mississippi Squirrel Revival" -- (31:58) Emery performs his commercial outros, and Emery and Stevens say their goodbyes
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Emery, Ralph; Stevens, Ray; Stevens, Ray, 1939-;
